## Description {#details}

Base class for types.

TODO: Remove the hardcoded name and context, since many types don&#39;t use them. TODO: Split up flags.

Uses the SubclassData32 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slot.

Definition at line 710 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
